Uses of Class
com.azure.storage.common.credentials.SASTokenCredential

  • Packages that use SASTokenCredential 
    Package Description
    com.azure.storage.blob
    Package containing the classes for BlobServiceClient.
    com.azure.storage.common.credentials
    This package contains credentials used by Azure Storage services.
    com.azure.storage.common.policy
    This package contains policies used by Azure Storage services.
    com.azure.storage.file  
    com.azure.storage.queue
    This package contains the classes to perform actions on Azure Storage Queue.

    • Uses of SASTokenCredential in com.azure.storage.common.credentials

      Methods in com.azure.storage.common.credentials that return SASTokenCredential 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SASTokenCredential SASTokenCredential.fromQueryParameters(SASQueryParameters queryParameters)
      Creates a SAS token credential from the passed SASQueryParameters.
      static SASTokenCredential SASTokenCredential.fromSASTokenString(java.lang.String sasToken)
      Creates a SAS token credential from the passed SAS token.

    • Uses of SASTokenCredential in com.azure.storage.common.policy

      Constructors in com.azure.storage.common.policy with parameters of type SASTokenCredential 
      Constructor and Description
      SASTokenCredentialPolicy(SASTokenCredential credential)
      Creates a SAS token credential policy that appends the SAS token to the request URL's query.
